rows.label: qev025601_MSG0001
rows.name:
Pardon me, but I'm gathering data at the moment,
you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0002
rows.name:
Hrmmm... This emotional response is "anger," is it?
A fine sample too. Now commencing an experimental
test to neutralize said response, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0003
rows.name:
You are advised that sustained periods of heightened
blood pressure yield negative health effects, all right?
Probably best to to discontinue your excitation at once?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0004
rows.name:
What the hell are you rambling on about, man?
You don't know how I feel! Something REALLY
important to me just got all messed up![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0005
rows.name:
And it's not like I'm TRYING to be mad here!
...Seriously, are you trying to pick a fight with me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0006
rows.name:
Oh, I would never choose to fight someone, would I?
Fighting is is is a most unprofitable action, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0007
rows.name:
Urgh, I can NOT deal with a socially illiterate Ma-non
right now. Please, just...go away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0008
rows.name:
...Goodness. I was rebuked, yes? Yes. And and and
accused of being unable to read in a public setting,
which is most clearly untrue, is it not?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0009
rows.name:
...Er, you there. Can I ask a third-party opinion,
perhaps? Did I make a mistake in the preceding
conversation?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_JNK0010
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev025601_SEL0011
rows.name:
Explain to Chiopitus how he
rubbed the man the wrong way.

rows.label: qev025601_JNK0020
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev025601_SEL0021
rows.name: Smile and tell Chiopitus that he was perfectly fine.

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0010
rows.name:
...Hmm. It appears you are as inscrutable as the rest of
your species, aren't you now?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0011
rows.name:
Hmm. Did you know that you are the very first human
to ever say something like that to me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0012
rows.name:
It is quite likely that a fundamental part of you as a
human is broken, perhaps? Still, many thanks.
Many many thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0013
rows.name:
I have attempted conversations with many many
different humans, but all of them have offered reactions
similar to his, haven't they?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0014
rows.name:
So instead, I shifted to quantitative analysis, using
readings taken from this Emotion-O-Meter of my own
invention, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0015
rows.name:
Yet affecting the subject's emotional state in the desired
manner still still still eludes me, and I've made little
progress toward understanding it, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0016
rows.name:
Might I ask your assistance in my research, for the sake
of Ma-non-human relations? Er, perhaps? Okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0017
rows.name:
First, I would ask for a demonstration in returning the
prior subject's emotional state from angry to calm.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0018
rows.name:
Analyzing the numbers on that process should provide
me a clear window into human anger, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0023
rows.name:
A sustained increase in blood pressure due to anger is
deleterious to the health, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0024
rows.name:
Why, then, does the subject persist in his elevated
state of excitation? Intentional self-harm?
Masochism, perhaps?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0025
rows.name:
Please assist me in solving this mystery by calming the
subject's emotional state, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0026
rows.name:
This is my next test subject.
She appears to be in a state of "sorrow," doesn't she?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0027
rows.name:
...Er, pardon me, but but may I ask what sequence of
events is responsible for your sorrow?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0028
rows.name: What? How did you know I...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0029
rows.name:
My newly invented Emotion-O-Meter can detect your
emotional state at a mere glance, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0030
rows.name:
Depressed brain-wave activity, low body temperature...
These are all symptoms of sorrow, are they not?
Your case is quite conclusive, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0032
rows.name:
Ah, and now your eyes are secreting alkaline fluid,
aren't they? I've heard about such human "tears."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0033
rows.name:
A BLADE regular of mine... He died fighting out there.
His name was Bobby.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0034
rows.name:
*sniff* He'd always sit there at the counter and order
a burger. Guy never got tired of 'em. And then he'd
tell me some terrible joke while he ate...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0035
rows.name:
He may have been a dope and a slob, but he was like
a son to me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0036
rows.name:
Ah! Her sorrow numbers are escalating rapidly,
aren't they? This is fantastic data![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_JNK0030
rows.name: Step In

rows.label: qev025601_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Chiopitus to be more considerate.

rows.label: qev025601_JNK0040
rows.name: Observe

rows.label: qev025601_SEL0041
rows.name: Allow Chiopitus to continue.

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0037
rows.name:
Considerate? That word seems to bear a highly
complex and situational nuance, does it not?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0038
rows.name:
It's frankly inscrutable. So maybe I should leave this
situation to your discretion?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0039
rows.name: Er, so what are you here for, anyway?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0040
rows.name: ...You came to cheer me up?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0041
rows.name:
That's...that's awfully sweet of you. *sniff* I mean,
nothing anyone does can bring Bobby back, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0042
rows.name:
...Ms. Pauline, what must occur for your sorrow values
to revert back to calm levels?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0043
rows.name:
*sniff* I haven't understood a single word out of your
mouth since you got here. Are you trying to cheer
me up?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0044
rows.name:
If "cheering up" means reducing your sorrow values,
then that is precisely my intent, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0045
rows.name:
Now kindly explain the mechanisms for decreasing
these numbers, yes? Yes. Explain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0046
rows.name:
I just wish I had something to remember him by is all.
Like the wristwatch he always wore, or...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0047
rows.name:
Anyway, if I had a little memento, I'd feel like he was
always close to me somehow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0048
rows.name:
Ah. This must relate to your human occult beliefs.
Though keeping a dead person close to to to oneself
sounds terrifying, doesn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0049
rows.name:
But very wellâ€”I ask that you retrieve this wristwatch as
soon as possible, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0050
rows.name:
W-wait. You're going to go track it down for me
just like that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0051
rows.name:
...I still do not understand you people at all,
but I guess you seem like nice folks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0052
rows.name:
Please locate that wristwatch in order to reduce the
subject's sorrow values, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0053
rows.name:
This is my next subject. Her heart rate is accelerated,
and her body temperature significantly above normal.
She's clearly disturbed, no?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0054
rows.name:
Yet the cause appears to be emotional rather than
physical, doesn't it? As such, I have no idea how to
categorize her affliction.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0055
rows.name: Perhaps observation will yield some clue? Maybe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0056
rows.name: Christopher... Why do you keep ignoring my feelings?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0057
rows.name:
I keep telling you how I feel, but you refuse to respond.
I thought you were just playing cool or that it was just
part of your deal, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0058
rows.name: I need to make you understand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0059
rows.name:
Hmm... This is neither anger nor sorrow, is it?
It appears, in fact, to be a muddled mess of many
things, no?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0060
rows.name: Maybe you have some insight into her emotional state?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_JNK0050
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev025601_SEL0051
rows.name: Explain to Chiopitus that it's called "love."

rows.label: qev025601_JNK0060
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev025601_SEL0061
rows.name: Shake your head and shrug.

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0061
rows.name:
"Love," you say? Another extremely complex term,
is it not?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0062
rows.name:
And yet this human love causes the chest to ache.
Therefore it must be pathological?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0063
rows.name:
Are you certain she does not require medical attention?
Perhaps we we we had best ask her directly, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0064
rows.name:
Ah! So even you are baffled, yes? She must be
suffering from an exceptionally rare condition![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0065
rows.name:
Christopher, you beautiful idiot... I love you!
Don't throw my love away![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0066
rows.name:
Unprovoked screaming...? Hyperventilation...?
Woebegone moaning...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0067
rows.name:
Is this "love" some sort of mental disease?
Perhaps we had best ask the subject directly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0068
rows.name:
...Er, you there. Are you presently in a state of love?
Please give me a concrete, detailed explanation if at
all possible, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0069
rows.name:
Augh! Were you eavesdropping, you little creep?
You better back off before I wreck you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0070
rows.name: First observation: Love is extremely violent, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0071
rows.name:
Violent? N-no! I'm a sweet, cute, funny girl who is
EXACTLY Christopher's type![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0072
rows.name:
I've said good-bye to the old tomboy for good,
and I won't let some shorty xeno get my goat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0073
rows.name:
Your pulse has been fast and your cheeks red
throughout my observation, right? What do you
require to to to end this abnormal state?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0074
rows.name:
I would dearly like to witness the moment your love is
cured for good, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0075
rows.name:
Cured...? Um, I don't really know. But I suppose I'd
calm down if he'd just respond to my feelings.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0076
rows.name:
Until then, this knot in my gut probably isn't going
anywhere...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0077
rows.name:
...Feelings? Hmm. Neither electronic mail nor courier
services will accept such feelings, will they?
They're far too vague. We need an alternative.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_JNK0070
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: qev025601_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Dana if she's considered writing a love letter.

rows.label: qev025601_JNK0080
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev025601_SEL0081
rows.name: Claim you're all out of ideas.

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0078
rows.name:
Hey, yeah! He's the sort of weirdo who'd probably go
in for that roundabout kind of thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0079
rows.name:
And you guys can pick out the perfect present to give
him while I write it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0080
rows.name:
Then I'll slip it into my letter and seal the deal!
Heh heh heh...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0081
rows.name:
I see you find love as vexing as I do, maybe?
It certainly seems to be the most bothersome emotion
I've yet encountered.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0082
rows.name:
Hey, I have an idea! Why don't you guys help me pick
out the perfect gift for him?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0083
rows.name:
Then I'll write him a love letter, put the present inside,
and BAM! He's all mine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0084
rows.name:
Now as for the present, I think a pair of red thallus
antennae like the ones the thalluses over at Big Arch
drop would be his style.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0085
rows.name:
They'd look pretty sharp as a necklace, don't you think?
All feral and manly![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0086
rows.name:
Then again Christopher's kind of a gearhead, so he'd
also probably like a couple of elemental clusters.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0087
rows.name:
Aaaargh, I can't choose! I'll just have to see them both
and then make a decision. So bring me both of them![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0088
rows.name:
Given sufficient data, I should be able to decipher this
emotion of love, shouldn't I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025601_MSG0089
rows.name:
So, um, please find the objects she requires, okay?
We must cure her before her condition worsens![ST:wait ]
